data.title: Don't Mention the Chorizos: When You're Not Jewish Enough for the Other Moms at School
data.meta_description: My Husband and I Enrolled Our Son in Madridâ€™s Only Jewish School Thinking He'd Learn the Religious Traditions That We Never Had. What We Weren't Prepared for Was a Crash Course in Being Jews in a City Steeped in anti-Semitic Lore.
